message.body: So did you get the check?
Yes I did sorry, got this at work yesterday night
I'll let mom know you got it. How are you? I'm really missing you tonight. I hope all is well. Love you
I know, I'm really feeling sad that I'm not coming Home for spring break. I'll watch my data use by the way. Could you also send some dry shampoo and the book "the god of small things"?
There's some at target - it's like an aerosol spray
